description:
Hijikata Toshizou is the former vice-commander of the Shinsengumi who died fighting in the name of the Tokugawa Bakufu during the Boshin War. Hijikata has the ability to use smoke to manifest ghostly images of members of the Shinsengumi and uses them to cut apart his enemies. He has become http://anidb.net/ch79268 [Toyohisa]`s rival following a battle between the two that ended in a draw.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Hijikata Toshizou
